lines.text: I think the French have so much oomph!
May you be in Heaven half-an-hour before the Devil finds out you're dead.
Well, if anything sensational should happen, send up a flare. I'll be right over. But don't brood on it. Things like this can create the most ghastly inhibitions.
He was so superbly democratic.

[to her father]
That's just the blarney in you.
That's just the baloney in him.

[to the butler]
Shoot the kidney to me, Sidney.

[while discussing the play 'Pygmalion']
I think one of the characters is on the dippy side.
Dad, we mustn't talk shop. After all, Marty isn't in the rubber business.
Why, one look at him and I can tell he has rubber in his blood.
Too bad you had to miss an Engine Show just for a birthday party.
Come on gate! Let's circulate
The language of the immortals.
I don't want to butt in, but I don't think you have a Chinaman's chance.
Well, the Chinese are doing all right, ain't they?
Hi, sugarpuss!
Hi, superman! Come on in.
Why, when he talks about connecting rods and clutch plates, he's positively symphonic!
You know, you can do almost anything with a hairpin.
That's what I adore about Spring. It's so uncertain. Sunshine and tears.
I was just thinking of what a tremendous difference a year makes. I know I must have been definitely ridiculous at 13.
Oh, I've known Joey for centuries.
How much would it cost?
Oh, millions.
[sighs]
It's sorry to even think of it.
Now you're cooking with gas!
When your dreams are gone, there isn't anything much left.
